mapper.select: select G.* , GO.*, S.STORE_NAME from GOODS G INNER JOIN GOODS_OPTION GO ON G.GOODS_NO = GO.GOODS_NO INNER JOIN STORE S ON S.STORE_NO = G.STORE_NO WHERE GOODS_MIDDLE_CATEGORY = #{GOODS_MIDDLE_CATEGORY}
select G.* , GO.*, S.STORE_NAME from GOODS G INNER JOIN GOODS_OPTION GO ON G.GOODS_NO = GO.GOODS_NO INNER JOIN STORE S ON S.STORE_NO = G.STORE_NO WHERE GOODS_STYLE = #{GOODS_STYLE}
